# start()

**Instance Method**

Prepares the filter to start, in response to a call from the framework.

## Declaration

```swift
func start() async throws
```

## Discussion

Override this method in your conformance to [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEURLFilterControlProvider] and perform whatever steps are necessary to prepare for fetching pre-filter data.

## Starting and stopping the provider

- **stop(reason:)**: Prepares the filter to stop, in response to a call from the framework.
